Summarize the key financial highlights
instructions: After running, add key terms that should appear in the summary
expected_answer: Record Fiscal Year Revenue: Apple reached a record $416 billion in revenue for the full 2025 fiscal year, marking a 6.43% increase over 2024. Strong Earnings Growth: The company achieved double-digit Earnings Per Share (EPS) growth for the year. Record Q4 Results: In the September quarter (Q4 2025), Apple reported $102.5 billion in revenue, up 8% year-over-year, exceeding analyst expectations. Record-Breaking Q1 2026 (Dec '25): The holiday quarter (ended Dec 27, 2025) saw $143.8 billion in revenue, a 16% increase year-over-year, setting a new all-time record, with EPS growing 19%. Capital Return: For the full fiscal year 2025, Apple returned $106.1 billion to shareholders, including $90.7 billion in share buybacks and $15.4 billion in dividends.
